result.text:
‘Severe Outages’—Switch To Gmail, Google Warns Microsoft Users

Google has attacked Microsoft for its relentless campaign to “trick” Chrome users into changing their browsers. But now it has borrowed from that playbook with aggressive tactics of its own, warning Microsoft users that “frequent and severe outages” as well as “security incidents” mandate a rethink. It’s time to switch to Gmail, Google says. https://t.co/w7o4l7Q0Dt
